com.github.crashdemons.playerheads.api

Interface PlayerHeadsAPI


  • public interface PlayerHeadsAPI
    Interface for the PlayerHeads API. This interface defines each method that the PlayerHeads API provides.
    Author:
    crashdemons (crashenator at gmail.com)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String formatLangString(String name, String... replacement)
      Retrieves and formats plugin display-string from the currently loaded PlayerHeads lang file.
      HeadIdentity getBoringHeadIdentity()
      Gets the details (type and owner) of a head for comparison and re-creation purposes for a "boring playerhead" as if 'dropboringplayerheads' was enabled.
      ItemStack getBoringPlayerheadItem(int num)
      Gets a "boring" playerhead without an owner as if "dropboringplayerheads" was enabled.
      CompatibilityProvider getCompatibilityProvider()
      Deprecated. 
      although this is provided and maintained, it is subject to change with plugin requirements, so you should avoid using it normally.
      PHHeadType getCustomHeadType() 
      ItemStack getHeadDrop(Entity e)
      Gets a stack of head items as they would normally be dropped from the given entity.
      HeadIdentity getHeadIdentity(BlockState state)
      Gets the details (type and owner) of a head for comparison and re-creation purposes.
      HeadIdentity getHeadIdentity(Entity e)
      Gets the details (type and owner) of a head for comparison and re-creation purposes for an entity's head.
      HeadIdentity getHeadIdentity(EntityType et)
      Deprecated. 
      this may not do exactly what you want because between MC 1.10-1.13 many entities were separated from variants to their own. Also, this foregoes any head ownership information beyond the that defined by the type of mob/head.
      HeadIdentity getHeadIdentity(ItemStack stack)
      Gets the details (type and owner) of a head for comparison and re-creation purposes.
      HeadIdentity getHeadIdentity(OfflinePlayer player, boolean forceOwner)
      Gets the details (type and owner) of a head for comparison and re-creation purposes for a user's head.
      HeadIdentity getHeadIdentity(PHHeadType ht)
      Gets the details (type and owner) of a head for comparison and re-creation purposes for an inbuilt HeadType.
      HeadIdentity getHeadIdentity(String username, boolean forceOwner)
      Gets the details (type and owner) of a head for comparison and re-creation purposes for a user's head.
      HeadIdentity getHeadIdentityFromSpawnString(String spawnName, boolean forceOwner)
      Gets the details (type and owner) of a head for comparison and re-creation purposes the head represented by a 'spawn' string (like #zombie or playername).
      ItemStack getHeadItem(HeadIdentity head, int num)
      Create head items from the head representation details (type and owner).
      ItemStack getHeadItem(OfflinePlayer player, int num, boolean forceOwner)
      Gets the playerhead for the user provided.
      ItemStack getHeadItem(String username, int num, boolean forceOwner)
      Gets the playerhead for the user provided.
      ItemStack getHeadItemFromSpawnString(String spawnName, int num, boolean forceOwner)
      Gets a head item based on the 'spawn' string used in PlayerHeads (like #zombie or playername).
      String getLangString(String name)
      Retrieves a plugin display-string from the currently loaded PlayerHeads lang file.
      PlayerHeadsPlugin getPlugin()
      Get the main PlayerHeads Plugin instance
      String getVersion()
      Get the version of the PlayerHeads plugin in use

    • Method Detail

      • getPlugin

        @Nullable
PlayerHeadsPlugin getPlugin()
        Get the main PlayerHeads Plugin instance
        Returns:
        the PlayerHeads plugin object, or null if unavailable.

      • getVersion

        @Nullable
String getVersion()
        Get the version of the PlayerHeads plugin in use
        Returns:
        the version of the PlayerHeads plugin in use

      • getHeadDrop

        @Nullable
ItemStack getHeadDrop(@NotNull
                                 Entity e)
        Gets a stack of head items as they would normally be dropped from the given entity. Note: this method takes into full account plugin configuration settings, player's name, and preset item drop amount
        Parameters:
        e - the entity to create items from
        Returns:
        The item stack, or null if the entity head type was null (unsupported mob).

      • getBoringPlayerheadItem

        @NotNull
ItemStack getBoringPlayerheadItem(int num)
        Gets a "boring" playerhead without an owner as if "dropboringplayerheads" was enabled. This head is provided without manipulation by configuration settings except 'addlore'.
        Parameters:
        num - number of head items to get
        Returns:
        the item stack requested
        Since:
        5.1.1-SNAPSHOT

      • getHeadItem

        @NotNull
ItemStack getHeadItem(@NotNull
                                String username,
                                int num,
                                boolean forceOwner)
        Gets the playerhead for the user provided. This head is provided subject to configuration settings like 'dropboringplayerheads' and 'addlore'
        Parameters:
        username - the username for the playerhead
        num - number of items to include of the head
        forceOwner - if true, ignore the state of 'dropboringplayerheads' and provide a head for the owner anyway
        Returns:
        the itemstack requested
        Since:
        5.1.1-SNAPSHOT

      • getHeadItem

        @Nullable
ItemStack getHeadItem(OfflinePlayer player,
                                 int num,
                                 boolean forceOwner)
        Gets the playerhead for the user provided. This head is provided subject to configuration settings like 'dropboringplayerheads' and 'addlore' Note: this is based on username lookup.
        Parameters:
        player - the player to retrieve a head for
        num - number of items to include of the head
        forceOwner - if true, ignore the state of 'dropboringplayerheads' and provide a head for the owner anyway
        Returns:
        the itemstack requested, or null if the username could not be determined.
        Since:
        5.1.1-SNAPSHOT

      • getHeadItemFromSpawnString

        @Nullable
ItemStack getHeadItemFromSpawnString(String spawnName,
                                                int num,
                                                boolean forceOwner)
        Gets a head item based on the 'spawn' string used in PlayerHeads (like #zombie or playername). This head is provided subject to configuration settings like 'dropboringplayerheads' and 'addlore'
        Parameters:
        spawnName - the spawn string (#mobname or username)
        num - the number of heads to provide in the stack
        forceOwner - if true, ignore the state of 'dropboringplayerheads' and provide head information for the owner anyway
        Returns:
        the stack of heads, or null

      • getCompatibilityProvider

        @Deprecated
 @Nullable
CompatibilityProvider getCompatibilityProvider()
        Deprecated. although this is provided and maintained, it is subject to change with plugin requirements, so you should avoid using it normally.
        Gets an instance of a class that provides many useful crossversion PlayerHeads capabilities that would normally be version-specific. For example: viewing and editing ownership information for skinned playerheads. These may be more subject to change than other API methods, so you should avoid them except when necessary.
        Returns:
        the CompatibilityProvider instance or null if PlayerHeads plugin was not initialized yet.
        Since:
        5.1.1-SNAPSHOT

      • getHeadIdentityFromSpawnString

        HeadIdentity getHeadIdentityFromSpawnString(String spawnName,
                                            boolean forceOwner)
        Gets the details (type and owner) of a head for comparison and re-creation purposes the head represented by a 'spawn' string (like #zombie or playername). This is NOT subject to configuration settings except for 'dropboringplayerheads'
        Parameters:
        spawnName - the spawn string (#mobname or username)
        forceOwner - if true, ignore the state of 'dropboringplayerheads' and provide head information for the owner anyway
        Returns:
        the representation details for the head
        Since:
        5.3.0-SNAPSHOT

      • getHeadIdentity

        @Nullable
HeadIdentity getHeadIdentity(@NotNull
                                        Entity e)
        Gets the details (type and owner) of a head for comparison and re-creation purposes for an entity's head. This is NOT subject to configuration settings except for 'dropboringplayerheads'
        Parameters:
        e - the entity to get the head for
        Returns:
        the representation details for the head
        Since:
        5.3.0-SNAPSHOT

      • getHeadIdentity

        @NotNull
HeadIdentity getHeadIdentity(@NotNull
                                       String username,
                                       boolean forceOwner)
        Gets the details (type and owner) of a head for comparison and re-creation purposes for a user's head. This is NOT subject to configuration settings except for 'dropboringplayerheads'
        Parameters:
        username - the username to get the head for.
        forceOwner - if true, ignore the state of 'dropboringplayerheads' and provide head information for the owner anyway
        Returns:
        the representation details for the head
        Since:
        5.3.0-SNAPSHOT

      • getHeadIdentity

        @NotNull
HeadIdentity getHeadIdentity(@NotNull
                                       OfflinePlayer player,
                                       boolean forceOwner)
        Gets the details (type and owner) of a head for comparison and re-creation purposes for a user's head. This is NOT subject to configuration settings except for 'dropboringplayerheads'
        Parameters:
        player - the player to get the head for.
        forceOwner - if true, ignore the state of 'dropboringplayerheads' and provide head information for the owner anyway
        Returns:
        the representation details for the head

      • getBoringHeadIdentity

        @NotNull
HeadIdentity getBoringHeadIdentity()
        Gets the details (type and owner) of a head for comparison and re-creation purposes for a "boring playerhead" as if 'dropboringplayerheads' was enabled.
        Returns:
        the representation details for the head
        Since:
        5.3.0-SNAPSHOT

      • getHeadIdentity

        @Nullable
HeadIdentity getHeadIdentity(@NotNull
                                        ItemStack stack)
        Gets the details (type and owner) of a head for comparison and re-creation purposes.
        Parameters:
        stack - the item stack to determine head information
        Returns:
        the head representation.
        Since:
        5.3.0-SNAPSHOT

      • getHeadIdentity

        @Nullable
HeadIdentity getHeadIdentity(@NotNull
                                        BlockState state)
        Gets the details (type and owner) of a head for comparison and re-creation purposes.
        Parameters:
        state - the block-state to determine head information
        Returns:
        the head representation.
        Since:
        5.3.0-SNAPSHOT

      • getHeadItem

        @NotNull
ItemStack getHeadItem(HeadIdentity head,
                                int num)
        Create head items from the head representation details (type and owner). This is subject to configuration options like 'addlore', however ownership information will override 'dropboringplayerheads'
        Parameters:
        head - the details defining the head
        num - the number of heads to create in the stack.
        Returns:
        the item based on the head representation.
        Since:
        5.3.0-SNAPSHOT

      • getCustomHeadType

        @NotNull
PHHeadType getCustomHeadType()

      • getHeadIdentity

        @Deprecated
 @Nullable
HeadIdentity getHeadIdentity(@NotNull
                                                      EntityType et)
        Deprecated. this may not do exactly what you want because between MC 1.10-1.13 many entities were separated from variants to their own. Also, this foregoes any head ownership information beyond the that defined by the type of mob/head.
        Gets the details (type and owner) of a head for comparison and re-creation purposes for an entitytype's head. This is NOT subject to configuration settings except for 'dropboringplayerheads'
        Parameters:
        et - the entity-type to get the head for
        Returns:
        the representation details for the head
        Since:
        5.3.0-SNAPSHOT

      • getHeadIdentity

        @Nullable
HeadIdentity getHeadIdentity(@NotNull
                                        PHHeadType ht)
        Gets the details (type and owner) of a head for comparison and re-creation purposes for an inbuilt HeadType. This is NOT subject to configuration settings except for 'dropboringplayerheads'. Note: this method only converts the information associated with the preset head-type and does not represent any extended mob ownership information.
        Parameters:
        ht - the head-type to get the head for
        Returns:
        the representation details for the head
        Since:
        5.3.0-SNAPSHOT

      • getLangString

        @NotNull
String getLangString(@NotNull
                               String name)
        Retrieves a plugin display-string from the currently loaded PlayerHeads lang file. This may need to be formatted.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of display-string defined by the lang file entry
        Returns:
        the string from the lang file, or the requested name surrounded by exclamation-points.

      • formatLangString

        @NotNull
String formatLangString(@NotNull
                                  String name,
                                  String... replacement)
        Retrieves and formats plugin display-string from the currently loaded PlayerHeads lang file. This may need to be formatted with Formatter.format(...)
        Parameters:
        name - the name of display-string defined by the lang file entry
        replacement - the string replacement or replacements used when formatting the string.
        Returns:
        the string from the lang file, or the requested name surrounded by exclamation-points.
